Room.Name: Elven Training Grounds
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the main reception area of the Elven Training Grounds.
Room.LongDescription: The Elven Training Grounds is a place to go to practice your skills against the best warriors. To the southeast are the hand-to-hand combat areas where elves fight each other (usually to settle disputes). To the southwest are the dragon combat areas. The elves would like to eventually reclaim their city from the dragons and have managed to cature a number of them to practice their fighting skills on.
